import React from 'react' import classes from "../../css/filterPanel.module.css" import Filter from '../Icons/Filter' import FilterButtton from './FilterButtton' import { useState } from 'react' function FilterPanel(props) { const [showPanel, setShowPanel] = useState(false) const [counter, setCounter] = useState(0); const controlPanel = ()=>{ {showPanel? setShowPanel(false): setShowPanel(true)} setCounter(counter+1) } return (
{window.innerWidth <= 500 ?
: showPanel?
: counter===0 && !showPanel ? "" :
}
) } export default FilterPanel
